```{r}
group2sd1n100 <- bind_rows(glmerresults_2groups, .id = "id")

group3sd0.5n20, group3sd0.5n30, group3sd0.5n50, group3sd0.5n100)
```

#tests 
```{r}
alpha <- 0.05 #set threshold for significance 
#pvalues
group2 <- group2 %>% 
  mutate(psig = if_else(pval < alpha, "sig", "nonsig")) #p<.05 --> rej null TRUE, do not rej FALSE

group3 <- group3 %>% 
  mutate(psig = if_else(pval < alpha, "sig", "nonsig")) #p<.05 --> rej null TRUE, do not rej FALSE

#bayes factors 
group2 <- group2 %>% mutate(bf_prop = if_else(exp(bf) > 3, "null", "no"))
group3 <- group3 %>% mutate(bf_prop = if_else(exp(bf) > 3, "null", "no"))

#loo & waic 
group2 <- group2 %>% mutate(
  loo_results = if_else(abs(loo_diff) > abs(2*loo_se),"yes", "no"),
  waic_results = if_else(abs(waic_diff) > abs(2*waic_se), "yes", "no")
) %>% 
  rename(samplesize = n)

group3 <- group3 %>% mutate(
  loo_results = if_else(abs(loo_diff) > abs(2*loo_se),"yes", "no"),
  waic_results = if_else(abs(waic_diff) > abs(2*waic_se), "yes", "no")
) %>% 
  rename(samplesize = n)
```

#run from here for results

#to calculate confidence intervals
```{r}
iter = 1000
pval_2group <- group2 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(psig) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "psig", values_from = "n") %>% 
  mutate(rate_typeIerr = sig/iter) %>% 
  rename(x = sig) 

pval_3group <- group3 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(psig) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "psig", values_from = "n") %>% 
  mutate(rate_typeIerr = sig/iter) %>% 
  rename(x = sig) 

bf_2group <- group2 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(bf_prop) %>% 
  filter(test != "freq") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "bf_prop", values_from = "n") %>% 
  mutate(rate_null = null/iter) %>% rename(x = null)
bf_2group$x[is.na(bf_2group$x)] <- 0
bf_2group$rate_null[is.na(bf_2group$rate_null)] <- 0

bf_3group <- group3 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(bf_prop) %>% 
  filter(test != "freq") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "bf_prop", values_from = "n")  %>% 
  mutate(rate_null = null/iter) %>% rename(x = null)
bf_3group$x[is.na(bf_3group$x)] <- 0
bf_3group$rate_null[is.na(bf_3group$rate_null)] <- 0

loo_2group <- group2 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(loo_results) %>% 
  filter(test != "freq") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "loo_results", values_from = "n") %>% 
  mutate(rate_yes = yes/iter) %>% rename(x = yes)#yes - more than 2sd 

loo_3group <- group3 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(loo_results) %>% 
  filter(test != "freq") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "loo_results", values_from = "n") %>% 
  mutate(rate_yes = yes/iter) %>% rename(x = yes)

waic_2group <- group2 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(waic_results) %>% 
  filter(test != "freq") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "waic_results", values_from = "n") %>% 
  mutate(rate_yes = yes/iter) %>% rename(x = yes)
waic_2group$x[is.na(waic_2group$x)] <- 0
waic_2group$rate_yes[is.na(waic_2group$rate_yes)] <- 0

waic_3group <- group3 %>% 
  group_by(samplesize, test, sd) %>% 
  count(waic_results) %>% 
  filter(test != "freq") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "waic_results", values_from = "n") %>% 
  mutate(rate_yes = yes/iter) %>% rename(x = yes)
waic_3group$x[is.na(waic_3group$x)] <- 0
waic_3group$rate_yes[is.na(waic_3group$rate_yes)] <- 0
```

#confidence intervals
```{r}
wald2_ci <- binom.bayes(pval_2group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
wald2_ci <- wald2_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(pval_2group, by = "x")

wald3_ci <- binom.bayes(pval_3group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
wald3_ci <- wald3_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(pval_3group, by = "x")

bf2_ci <- binom.bayes(bf_2group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
bf2_ci <- bf2_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(bf_2group, by = "x")

bf3_ci <- binom.bayes(bf_3group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
bf3_ci <- bf3_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(bf_3group, by = "x")

loo2_ci <- binom.bayes(loo_2group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
loo2_ci <- loo2_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(loo_2group, by = "x")

loo3_ci <- binom.bayes(loo_3group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
loo3_ci <- loo3_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(loo_3group, by = "x")

waic2_ci <- binom.bayes(waic_2group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
waic2_ci <- waic2_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(waic_2group, by = "x")

waic3_ci <- binom.bayes(waic_3group$x, 1000, conf.level = 0.95, tol = 1e-9)
waic3_ci <- waic3_ci %>% select(-n) %>% 
  inner_join(waic_3group, by = "x")
```

#plot by type of test
##2group
```{r}
#wald p value 
ggplot(group2, aes(x = pval)) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(y = after_stat(density)), binwidth = .05, boundary = 0) + 
  facet_grid(test ~ sd + samplesize)  + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = .05)

plot_finaltwogroups <- group2 %>% filter(test != "freq")

ggplot(plot_finaltwogroups, aes(x = bf)) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(y = after_stat(density)), binwidth = .05, boundary = 0) + 
  facet_grid(test ~ sd + samplesize)  + 
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0)  
```

#big ci plot 
```{r}
wald2_ci$type <- "wald" 
wald3_ci$type <- "wald" 

bf2_ci$type <- "bf" 
bf3_ci$type <- "bf" 

loo2_ci$type <- "loo" 
loo3_ci$type <- "loo" 
waic2_ci$type <- "waic" 
waic3_ci$type <- "waic" 
ci2 <- bind_rows(wald2_ci, bf2_ci,loo2_ci,waic2_ci)
ci3 <- bind_rows(wald3_ci, bf3_ci,loo3_ci,waic3_ci)

ggplot(ci2, aes(x = samplesize, y = mean)) + 
  geom_line() + geom_point(size = 0.2) + geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lower, ymax = upper), width = 0.5) + facet_grid(test ~ type) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = .05, colour = "grey")

ggplot(ci3, aes(x = samplesize, y = mean)) + 
  geom_line() + geom_pointrange(aes(ymin = lower, ymax = upper), size = 0.2) + facet_grid(test ~ type)
```
